25.1. 变量处理

如果 logfile 值已经存在侧不会覆盖

$ logfile=/var/log/test.log

$ echo $logfile
/var/log/test.log

$ logfile=${logfile:-/tmp/test.log}

$ echo $logfile
/var/log/test.log

如果变量为空才能设置

$ unset logfile
$ logfile=${logfile:-/tmp/test.log}
$ echo $logfile
/tmp/test.log

25.1.1. 变量销毁

$ unset logfile
